channel.title: Help!?!error connecting to server!?!?!?!?!?
channel.description: [size=18pt][font=arial black][b]I am using Xboxscape server+client... i start both of those up with my no-ip and when i go to sign in it says ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER I dont know what to do this is my first server... I will give credits to who ever is the biggest help and can help fix the problem[/b][/font][/size]

item.title: Help!?!error connecting to server!?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[size=36pt]DID YOU ALLOW YOUR PORT IN YOUR FIREWALL?[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Help!?!error connecting to server!?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:6, topic:379170”][quote author=Cbond link=topic=475020.msg3473553#msg3473553 date=1295484854]
[size=18pt][font=arial black]Thx when its finished i will give some credits 2 u and on my big upcoming server scene i really need this skill[/font][/size]
[/quote]
[size=18pt]DONT WRITE LIKE THIS IN CAPS IT ONLY PISSES PEOPLE OFF[/size]

If that doesnt work, portforward via utorrent.[/quote]
[size=18pt]Pardon? i didnt quite see what you wrote, maybe if you could make your font a little bigger![/size]

If that still doesnt work its probably your anti virus blocking your port so yeah :S

Read full topic

item.title: Help!?!error connecting to server!?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill

Go to portforward.com and follow their instructions to portforward, or if you think you have already, download their PFportchecker and check it out.
